title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2002.10 - Approvals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2002.10 - Approvals

State Regulations
(a) Upon completion
of each design phase of the project, the corporation shall notify the
municipality and, until the municipality has given the corporation its approval
in writing of such phase, the corporation shall not proceed to any subsequent
phase unless authorized in writing by the municipality. (b) Upon receipt of bids for construction, the corporation shall not award any construction contracts until the
municipality has given the corporation its approval in writing to award any
such contract. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2002.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
